text: @RobynUrback @globeandmail Thanks for opining but I am going to rely on Bill Gates, whose foundation is the second largest funder of the WHO. Their private sector approach to assessing their investments is more reliable than political claptrap. https://t.co/FhiABDgOeF

domain.name: Person

domain.description: Top level interests and hobbies groupings, like Food or Travel

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
